questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

questions.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
questions.description: You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the ith day. Return the maximum profit you can achieve.

questions.title: Product of Array Except Self
questions.description: Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i].

questions.title: Subarray Sum Equals K
questions.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer k, return the total number of subarrays whose sum equals k.

questions.title: Find the Duplicate Number
questions.description: Given an array of integers nums containing n + 1 integers where each integer is in the range [1, n] inclusive, find the duplicate number.

questions.title: Reverse String
questions.description: Write a function that reverses a string. The input string is given as an array of characters.

questions.title: Valid Anagram
questions.description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.

questions.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
questions.description: Given a string s, return the longest palindromic substring in s.

questions.title: Group Anagrams
questions.description: Given an array of strings, group the anagrams together.

questions.title: Minimum Window Substring
questions.description: Given two strings s and t, return the minimum window substring of s such that every character in t is included.
